steps.name: Make Levain
steps.description: Make the Levain that we add to the dough after autolayse.

steps.name: Autolayse Dough
steps.description: Mix the Flour and Salt. Then add the Water and mix.

steps.name: Mix Dough, Levain and Water.
steps.description: Use the Levain from earlier. Mix into the dough with a litle water. Kned really well. Put the kneaded dough into a bowl and cover.
